titles.title: Not What I Am O Lord (classic tune easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not what I am O Lord But what Thou art That that alone can be My soul's true rest Thy love not mine Bids fear and doubt depart And stills the tempest Of my tossing breast{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It is Thy perfect love That casts out fear I know the voice that speaks The "It is I" And in these well-known Words of heavenly cheer I hear the joy that bids Each sorrow fly{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy Name is Love I hear it from yon Cross Thy Name is Love I read it in yon tomb All meaner love is Perishable dross But this shall light me through Time's thickest gloom{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}It blesses now And shall for ever bless It saves me now And shall for ever save It holds me up In days of helplessness It bears me safely o'er Each swelling wave{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis what I know of Thee My Lord and God That fills my soul with peace My lips with song Thou art my health my joy My staff my rod Leaning on Thee In weakness I am strong{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}More of Thyself Oh show me hour by hour More of Thy glory O my God and Lord More of Thyself in all Thy grace and power More of Thy love and truth Incarnate Word{/lang-eng}
